snippet: The Federal Communications Commission has delayed its auction of broadcast airwaves to mid-2015, a year later than intended.
abstract: Federal Communications Commission delays its auction of broadcast airwaves to mid-2015, one year later than intended.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Communications Commission has delayed its auction of broadcast airwaves to mid-2015, a year later than intended.

headline.main: F.C.C. Delays Auction of Airwaves Until 2015
headline.print_headline: F.C.C. Delays Auction of Airwaves Until 2015
